title: Bobby Has A Big Announcement Coming Tonight + Amy's Kids Ate Plant Food
itunes:title: Bobby Has A Big Announcement Coming Tonight + Amy's Kids Ate Plant Food
description:
After posting a cryptic photo on Instagram, Bobby teases that he has a big announcement coming tonight. Amy's kids got caught eating plant food. Also, Eddie defends why he drank someone else's soda he found in a bathroom.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
